name: 3D Platformer Tutorial (Gray-Ant)
description:
W. Grant Hayward's 3D Platformer Tutorial Submission:

Suggested changes:

1. Add level 3 and make levels 2 and 3 more challenging

2. Make level 3 a different structure and layout on top of more challenging platforming

3. Mess around with the prefabs given to us. Attempt to change some of them.
